title: Fashion from start to finish
brief_description: Butterick, “Vogue” and “See’n Sew” are together the world’s largest pattern house. The film examines the role of each person involved in the design and manufacture of patterns. An advertisment for “Butterick”, but a fast-moving comprehensive coverage. No other credits. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
